TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A drug used to treat bacterial infections. It is a type of fluoroquinolone. Also called moxifloxacin and moxifloxacin hydrochloride.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento que se usa para tratar infecciones bacterianas. Es un tipo de fluoroquinolona. Tambi√©n se llama hidrocloruro de moxifloxacino y moxifloxacino.
